description: An RDF/OWL vocabulary for representing spatial information
label: GeoSPARQL Ontology

Feature.description: A discrete spatial phenomenon in a universe of discourse.
Feature.label: Feature

SpatialObject.description: Anything spatial (being or having a shape, position or an extent).
SpatialObject.label: Spatial Object

Geometry.description: A coherent set of direct positions in space. The positions are held within a Spatial Reference System (SRS).
Geometry.label: Geometry

SpatialObjectCollection.description: A collection of individual Spatial Objects.
SpatialObjectCollection.label: Spatial Object Collection

asDGGS.description: The Discrete Global Grid System (DGGS) serialization of a Geometry
asDGGS.label: as DGGS

hasSerialization.description: Connects a Geometry object with its text-based serialization.
hasSerialization.label: has serialization

asGML.description: The GML serialization of a Geometry
asGML.label: as GML

asGeoJSON.description: The GeoJSON serialization of a Geometry
asGeoJSON.label: as GeoJSON

asKML.description: The KML serialization of a Geometry
asKML.label: as KML

asWKT.description: The WKT serialization of a Geometry
asWKT.label: as WKT

coordinateDimension.description: The number of measurements or axes needed to describe the position of this Geometry in a coordinate system.
coordinateDimension.label: coordinate dimension

defaultGeometry.description: The default Geometry to be used in spatial calculations. It is usually the most detailed Geometry.
defaultGeometry.label: default geometry

hasGeometry.description: A spatial representation for a given Feature.
hasGeometry.label: has geometry

hasDefaultGeometry.description: The default Geometry to be used in spatial calculations. It is usually the most detailed Geometry.
hasDefaultGeometry.label: has default geometry

dimension.description: The topological dimension of this geometric object, which must be less than or equal to the coordinate dimension. In non-homogeneous collections, this will return the largest topological dimension of the contained objects.
dimension.label: dimension

ehContains.description: States that the subject SpatialObject spatially contains the object SpatialObject. DE-9IM: T*TFF*FF*
ehContains.label: contains

ehCoveredBy.description: States that the subject SpatialObject is spatially covered by the object SpatialObject. DE-9IM: TFF*TFT**
ehCoveredBy.label: covered by

ehCovers.description: States that the subject SpatialObject spatially covers the object SpatialObject. DE-9IM: T*TFT*FF*
ehCovers.label: covers

ehDisjoint.description: States that the subject SpatialObject is spatially disjoint from the object SpatialObject. DE-9IM: FF*FF****
ehDisjoint.label: disjoint

sfDisjoint.description: States that the subject SpatialObject is spatially disjoint from the object SpatialObject. DE-9IM: FF*FF****
sfDisjoint.label: disjoint

ehEquals.description: States that the subject SpatialObject spatially equals the object SpatialObject. DE-9IM: TFFFTFFFT
ehEquals.label: equals

sfEquals.description: States that the subject SpatialObject spatially equals the object SpatialObject. DE-9IM: TFFFTFFFT
sfEquals.label: equals

ehInside.description: States that the subject SpatialObject is spatially inside the object SpatialObject. DE-9IM: TFF*FFT**
ehInside.label: inside

ehMeet.description: States that the subject SpatialObject spatially meets the object SpatialObject. DE-9IM: FT******* ^ F**T***** ^ F***T****
ehMeet.label: meet

sfTouches.description: States that the subject SpatialObject spatially touches the object SpatialObject. DE-9IM: FT******* ^ F**T***** ^ F***T****
sfTouches.label: touches

ehOverlap.description: States that the subject SpatialObject spatially overlaps the object SpatialObject. DE-9IM: T*T***T**
ehOverlap.label: overlap

hasArea.description: The area of a Spatial Object.
hasArea.label: has area

hasSize.description: Subproperties of this property are used to indicate the size of a Spatial Object as a measurement or estimate of one or more dimensions of the Spatial Object's spatial presence.
hasSize.label: has size

hasBoundingBox.description: The target is a Geometry that defines a rectilinear region whose edges are aligned with the axes of the coordinate reference system, which exactly contains the Feature, for example an instance of http://www.opengis.net/ont/sf#envelope.
hasBoundingBox.label: has bounding box

hasCentroid.description: The target Geometry shall describe a point, for example an instance of http://www.opengis.net/ont/sf#Point.
hasCentroid.label: has centroid

hasLength.description: The length of a Spatial Object.
hasLength.label: has length

hasMetricArea.description: The area of a Spatial Object in square meters.
hasMetricArea.label: has area in square meters

hasMetricSize.description: Subproperties of this property are used to indicate the size of a Spatial Object, as a measurement or estimate of one or more dimensions of the Spatial Object's spatial presence. Units are always metric (meter, square meter or cubic meter).
hasMetricSize.label: has metric size

hasMetricLength.description: The length of a Spatial Object in meters.
hasMetricLength.label: has length in meters

hasMetricPerimeterLength.description: The length of the perimeter of a Spatial Object in meters.
hasMetricPerimeterLength.label: has perimeter length in meters

hasMetricSpatialAccuracy.description: The positional accuracy of the coordinates of a Geometry in meters.
hasMetricSpatialAccuracy.label: has spatial accuracy in meters

hasMetricSpatialResolution.description: The spatial resolution of a Geometry in meters.
hasMetricSpatialResolution.label: has spatial resolution in meters

hasMetricVolume.description: The volume of a Spatial Object in cubic meters.
hasMetricVolume.label: has volume in cubic meters

hasPerimeterLength.description: The length of the perimeter of a Spatial Object.
hasPerimeterLength.label: has perimeter length

hasSpatialAccuracy.description: The positional accuracy of the coordinates of a Geometry.
hasSpatialAccuracy.label: has spatial accuracy

hasSpatialResolution.description: The spatial resolution of a Geometry.
hasSpatialResolution.label: has spatial resolution

hasVolume.description: The volume of a three-dimensional Spatial Object.
hasVolume.label: has volume

isEmpty.description: (true) if this geometric object is the empty Geometry. If true, then this geometric object represents the empty point set for the coordinate space.
isEmpty.label: is empty

isSimple.description: (true) if this geometric object has no anomalous geometric points, such as self intersection or self tangency.
isSimple.label: is simple

rcc8dc.description: States that the subject SpatialObject is spatially disjoint from the object SpatialObject. DE-9IM: FFTFFTTTT
rcc8dc.label: disconnected

rcc8ec.description: States that the subject SpatialObject spatially meets the object SpatialObject. DE-9IM: FFTFTTTTT
rcc8ec.label: externally connected

rcc8eq.description: States that the subject SpatialObject spatially equals the object SpatialObject. DE-9IM: TFFFTFFFT
rcc8eq.label: equals

rcc8ntpp.description: States that the subject SpatialObject is spatially inside the object SpatialObject. DE-9IM: TFFTFFTTT
rcc8ntpp.label: non-tangential proper part

rcc8ntppi.description: States that the subject SpatialObject spatially contains the object SpatialObject. DE-9IM: TTTFFTFFT
rcc8ntppi.label: non-tangential proper part inverse

rcc8po.description: States that the subject SpatialObject spatially overlaps the object SpatialObject. DE-9IM: TTTTTTTTT
rcc8po.label: partially overlapping

rcc8tpp.description: States that the subject SpatialObject is spatially covered by the object SpatialObject. DE-9IM: TFFTTFTTT
rcc8tpp.label: tangential proper part

rcc8tppi.description: States that the subject SpatialObject spatially covers the object SpatialObject. DE-9IM: TTTFTTFFT
rcc8tppi.label: tangential proper part inverse

sfContains.description: States that the subject SpatialObject spatially contains the object SpatialObject. DE-9IM: T*****FF*
sfContains.label: contains

sfCrosses.description: States that the subject SpatialObject spatially crosses the object SpatialObject. DE-9IM: T*T******
sfCrosses.label: crosses

sfIntersects.description: States that the subject SpatialObject is not spatially disjoint from the object SpatialObject. DE-9IM: T******** ^ *T******* ^ ***T***** ^ ****T****
sfIntersects.label: intersects

sfOverlaps.description: States that the subject SpatialObject spatially overlaps the object SpatialObject. DE-9IM: T*T***T**
sfOverlaps.label: overlaps

sfWithin.description: States that the subject SpatialObject is spatially within the object SpatialObject. DE-9IM: T*F**F***
sfWithin.label: within

spatialDimension.description: The number of measurements or axes needed to describe the spatial position of this Geometry in a coordinate system.
spatialDimension.label: spatial dimension
